answers.answer: No water is fine. That's strange to be told 12 hrs before. This is my fourth baby and they always said don't eat in the morning before the test. Good luck tomorrow
You can drink water. I was told just not to eat past midnight.

question: Hello beautiful moms and moms to be, hope y'all are doing wonderful? I will be having my gestational diabetes test tmrw, my doc said not to eat or drink anything for 12hrs b4 the test, does this include water? Thanks.
title: Gestational diabetes test
